discussion.author: CohenCyril
discussion.comment: @proux01 I believe it would make sense to perform this addition/refactoring on top of #682 instead. CC @pi8027

discussion.author: proux01
discussion.comment: Indeed, I missed that PR, that would make perfect sense, let me try that.

discussion.author: proux01
discussion.comment: @pi8027 fell free to cherry pick my commits in #682 and close this one if it's more convenient for you.

discussion.author: pi8027
discussion.comment: @proux01 I decided to include your commits in #682 except for "Add floorq and ceilq". My plan is to modify the Archimedean mixin to have the floor (and ceil) function inside it (but we cannot do that for the next release for compatibility reasons), and then we will be able to declare the `archiNumDomainType` instance of `rat` whose floor and ceil functions are convertible with your `floorq` and `ceilq`. If you agree with this plan, I will close this PR. Thanks for your contribution!

discussion.author: proux01
discussion.comment:
> @proux01 I decided to include your commits in #682 except for "Add floorq and ceilq". My plan is to modify the Archimedean mixin to have the floor (and ceil) function inside it (but we cannot do that for the next release for compatibility reasons), and then we will be able to declare the `archiNumDomainType` instance of `rat` whose floor and ceil functions are convertible with your `floorq` and `ceilq`. If you agree with this plan, I will close this PR. Thanks for your contribution!

Great, PR closed.

review_discussion.author: pi8027
review_discussion.comment: BTW, isn't it possible to define such `floorq` without case analysis on `0 <= numq x`?

review_discussion.author: proux01
review_discussion.comment: I don't think so, the integer division `%/` is symmetric around `0` whereas `floor` isn't.

commits.author: pi8027
commits.message:
Drop support for Coq 8.10 and deprecate the `deprecate` notation

- The `deprecate` notation and `iota_add` have been deprecated. All the uses of
  the `deprecate` notation have been replaced with the `deprecated` attribute.
- Deprecation aliases in `ssrnat` and `ssrnum` introduced in MathComp 1.11+beta1
  have been removed.
- Remove `VDFILE` related hacks from `Makefile.common`.

commits.author: Sobernard
commits.message: prepare for pull request : pbs with Hints, mainly for Cint1 and Cnat0

commits.author: pi8027
commits.message: Fix compilation, structure inheritance, and hints

commits.author: pi8027
commits.message: Remove `Qnat` and `Qint` except for names of lemmas

commits.author: pi8027
commits.message: Relocate int/nat subsets of an archiNumDomainType to ssrnum.v

commits.author: pi8027
commits.message: Deprecate the Archimedean structures/theory in ssrnum.v and re-export them from archimedean.v

commits.author: proux01
commits.message: Add a few lemmas about Num.floor

commits.author: proux01
commits.message: ratr commutes with floor and ceil
